Package rubank

Class AccountNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • rubank.AccountNumber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AccountNumber>
    public class AccountNumber
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<AccountNumber>
    The AccountNumber class represents an account number for a bank account. The account number consists of a branch code, account type code, and a 4-digit serial number. The account number can be compared to another account number. The account type can be downgraded from MONEY_MARKET to SAVINGS. The account number is generated using a fixed-seed random number generator.
